page.title: 11WINTERINGHAM PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: {75 children}aged 4 to 11 years attend the primary school. There are three classrooms plus a mobile classroom. Toilets and cloakrooms are indoors. The south wall of the school has a verandah. There is a separate dining room and a kitchen. A lawn and large field provide for games. The children are grouped into three classes with{four teachers,}three full and one part time. A{secretary}works part time. A{cook,}with the help of a {kitchen assistant, }provides about 45 cooked meals each day. Some chiidren have packed lunches. {Two dinner {supervisors}assist in the canteen. A {welfare assistant }helps with the younger children. A{caretaker}cleans the school daily and a part-time {groundsman}looks after the gardens. At 11, children transfer to the comprehensive school 3km away.
